web_snippets: Emily Stanley is an American professor of limnology at the University of Wisconsin–Madison. She was named a 2018 Ecological Society of America Fellow.

Emily Stanley is a professor in the Department of Integrative Biology and the Center for Limnology at the University of Wisconsin-Madison.
